EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: DURA PLUS ALCOHOL SANITIZER RECALL
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Valued Customer}},
Thank you for your recent purchase. This is to notify you that a recent shipment of Dura Plus Instant Hand Sanitizer 70% 350 ml, NPN 80021354 (product DP11034), was identified to have an expiry date of June 2017. This error was a result of a failed quality control report from the vendor, QCP Chemicals. Necessary changes are being made to address the issue so that it does not happen again. At this time, if you are in receipt of the above mentioned product we ask that you please dispose of it accordingly and contact Grand & Toy Customer Service to receive a full refund.
We apologize for the inconvenience this may cause. In the meantime, please check grandandtoy.com <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-BWW?cmp=?cmp=EBBSMARCORONAVIRUS20EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> for related products and inventory status.
Thank you for your business.
